title: The Pinball Arcade v1.49.9 DX9 & DX11 [VIPER666]
description:
--===VIPER666===--

All credits go to Machine4578 for cracking.

Pinball Arcade by FarSight Studios features exact recreations of the all-time greatest pinball tables from WilliamsÂ®, BallyÂ®, Stern PinballÂ®, and GottliebÂ® together in one game. Every flipper, bumper, sound effect, and display pixel has been painstakingly emulated in astonishing detail.
 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/238260/

Version v1.49.9 DX9 & DX11 + all DLCs pre-cracked.

If you have issues with the game be sure to install everything in the "_CommonRedist" folder

Note: The versions are separate, if you do not wish to play DX11 just deselect it in your torrent downloader.

Version 1.45.6
- Fixed large number of memory leaks throughout multiple tables.
- Added Judge Dredd

Version 1.46.7 (1/29/16)
- Added Fireball and El Dorado (EM Table Pack)
- Fixed seam on TAF playfield.
- Fixed Season 5 text in Italian and Spanish
- Fixed draw order issue on Funhouse which made ball not visible behind plastic ramps

Version 1.47.7 (2/19/16)
- Added Hurricane
- Art fixes on El Dorado and Fireball
- Added hum to EM table flippers.
- Fixed HUD on EM tables (Big Shot, Fireball and Central Park)

Version 1.48.5 (3/25/26)
- Fixed crash on startup.

Version 1.48.4 (3/25/26)
- Added Rescue 911
- Fixed HUD on EM tables (Big Shot, Fireball and Central Park)
- Fixed seam on TAF playfield.
- Fixed Season 5 text in Italian and Spanish
- Fixed draw order issue on Funhouse which made ball not visible behind plastic ramps
- Fixed game crash caused by an audio dll error.

Version 1.49.8 (4/22/16)
- Added Last Action Hero


--===VIPER666===
